definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Blue Allover is the most representative daily article and decorating article in the area South of Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 藍印花布是江南最有代表性的生活用品和裝飾用品。

sentences.english: We shall cover the seat of this old chair with chintz.
sentences.chinese: 我們將用印花布罩住這舊椅子的椅面。

sentences.english: One was a print of a Red Indian, given him, he told me, by Catlin;
sentences.chinese: 一件是北美印第安人的花布製品，他說是卡特林送的。

sentences.english: She'sdressed in a floaty white skirt and a cotton print camisole.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一條翩翩白裙和印花布緊身衣。

sentences.english: Girly floral printed skirt with mesh ruffled sweep…
sentences.chinese: 花布短裙，裙腳有網布褶飾邊。

sentences.english: We are sure to place a considerable order of cloth.
sentences.chinese: 我們有把握訂購大量的花布。

sentences.english: A floral printed bow trimmed on chest.
sentences.chinese: 胸前有花布蝴蝶結作裝飾。

sentences.english: This is a lovely print. The design is tropical.
sentences.chinese: 這是一塊漂亮的印花布，帶有熱帶的圖案。

sentences.english: Round neck, sleeveless frilled top in four layers and floral print.
sentences.chinese: 圓領無袖印花布上衣，以多層打褶式設計。

sentences.english: There are angels in printed cotton smocks .
sentences.chinese: 有許多穿着印花布罩衣的天使。

sentences.english: Intarsia knit star or heart at center front, or allover stripes.
sentences.chinese: 嵌花編織明星或在中心門前，或印花布條紋的心。
印花布嵌花編織獵豹打印。

sentences.english: This small coat was patched up with pieces of cloth of different colours.
sentences.chinese: 這件小襖兒是用各色花布鬥起來的。

sentences.english: Beneath that chintz housecoat beats a heart of pure evil.
sentences.chinese: 隱藏在印花布居家服下面的是一顆純邪惡的內心。
這是一塊漂亮的印花布。

sentences.english: The handicraft of blue allover is one of the important kinds of traditional handicraft.
sentences.chinese: 藍印花布是傳統工藝的重要門類。

definition: coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
